title: Consolidate Dashboard Models and Define Complete Widget Library
description:
Unify fragmented dashboard model definitions and create comprehensive widget library with all required widget types (My Tasks, Recent Activity, Priority Breakdown, Search, System Health). Consolidate duplicate schemas from dashboard.ts, dashboard-model.ts, and dashboard-widget-store.ts into a single source of truth. Implement proper TypeScript types using @tsimpl patterns with functional programming style.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Single dashboard-model.ts exports all types and schemas (eliminate duplicates)
- WidgetLibrary defines all 5 required widget types with appropriate metadata
- Each widget has defined defaultSize, minSize, and maxSize constraints
- Widget library exports as singleton instance for app-wide use
- All TypeScript types use @tsimpl StructSelf patterns
- Models follow functional programming with immutable updates
- 4-space indentation and double quotes throughout
